message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. This is a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't want to go above that.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. However, $900,000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $950,000, which is a significant discount from my initial offer. This is my final offer, so let me know if you're ready to close the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $925,000. That's the highest I can go.
